title: Decreasing inappropriate behaviours (TEFC): physical restraint
creator_contributor_role: Macomb Community College Instructional Television, production company

description: Episode number 5 of Series "Effective Behavioural Programming". Tape 5 : Discusses physical restraint and punishment programs. Teachers must be cautious in designing and implementing them because of their aversive nature. Both physical restraint and punishment have very powerful advantages, but they also have some serious drawbacks NB. This videotape is on 525 line NTSC
